item.title: SeCon 2020
item.description: I will be teaching one day of classes at CISPA’s 2nd edition of the Young Researcher Security Convention in March 2020. My classes will provide an overview of Hot topics in Cyber-Physical Security, for example current approaches to security in practical Industrial Control Systems, and recent research directions to improve the state of the art. More information can be found at the website of the event.

item.title: Cyber-Physical System Security School
item.description: I will be teaching one day of classes at the Cyber-Physical System Security School at the University of Padova in July 2019. My classes will provide an overview of current approaches to security in practical Industrial Control Systems, and recent research directions to improve the state of the art. More information can be found at the website of the event. Regular registration is still open until June 21st.
